stimulusHtml:
This question is based on one or two slides. For a question involving two slides, when you are not asked specifically to name the artists and/or titles of the works, you may refer to the work on the left as (L) and the work on the right as (R).

Read the question and take a moment to think about what the question asks. Formulate your answer and begin to write. You can only receive full credit by answering the question asked.

The architect of the building shown on the right is Leon Battista Alberti.

Name the period of the building on the right. How and why did Alberti adapt elements of the work on the left?

features.html:
LEFT

RIGHT
